title: Collaborative STEAM Class Design Based on Educational Robotics to Enhance Teacher Self-Efficacy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners who, as corporate education managers/leaders, must design and operate STEAM lessons linked to mathematics curricula.

learning_goals: Develop three or more math STEAM lesson plans integrating educational robotics (ER) using the collaborative lesson design (CLD) process
Demonstrate the ability to achieve over 80% consistency between learning objectives-assessments-activities in lesson design by incorporating team feedback
Record changes in self-efficacy at least three times through reflective journaling and establish improvement plans

resources: Educational Robot Kit (1 Set per Group)
Team-Based Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Notion, Google Docs)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
